notes: Through SAFE, WFP works with food insecure people to support their long-term food security and sustainable livelihoods. For additional information on SAFE, see http://www.wfp.org/climate-change/initiatives/safe. The Microsoft Excel spread sheet contains details of the villages supported under WFP's Safe Access to Fuel and Energy (SAFE) Initiative. The data set is a work in progress. It will be replaced once an updated copy is available.
